channel.title: My final preview of my client
channel.description:
well, ive been working on a client, and here is what ive got:
- Added metal Dragons upto rune - Added all other dragons (black, blue, red, green and kbd) - Added all baby dragons - Added Darkbeast - Added new hellhound - Added all new giants( hill, moss, ice, fire) - Dragon PlateBody - Dragon Kite - 481 gameframe working - All stat icons like jagex's - Added teletabs - Added new icons - Added void knight armour - New side icons - A good npc and player nearby system in the top right corner - Money colour - Hp above heads - All skill capes (t) - All skill capes - All skill hoods - All defenders upto dragon - All fighter stoof - All dragon stuff (like arrows, boots, helm) - All godswords - Bandos and armadyl armour - Dark bow - Full 3rd age - Alot more - No npc's as im just starting them. and more, ill get pics in a min :)
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/330bcxv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/rw2o3q.jpg[/img] [img]http://i177.photobucket.com/albums/w224/pker_kyle/hereugo.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i177.photobucket.com/albums/w224/pker_kyle/summoning.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i177.photobucket.com/albums/w224/pker_kyle/playmon.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i177.photobucket.com/albums/w224/pker_kyle/newicons-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i177.photobucket.com/albums/w224/pker_kyle/newframe.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.tip.it/runescape/mon2/King_Black_Dragon.gif[/img] [img]http://www.tip.it/runescape/mon2/Mithril_Dragon.gif[/img]
last to pictures go to the tip.it community, so thankyou for the pictures
i am getting some more pictures as we speak :p

item.title: My final preview of my client
item.dc:creator: @GalkonsPride GalkonsPride
item.description:
@GalkonsPride wrote:

There honestly isn’t anything unique about it… Try adding a jframe/jmenu, maybe some objects, npcs, every client now-adays has skillcapes, not that amazing. Try customizing it, I suggest:

Make a client BETA version, release it. Have people test it to see what they like

Take their suggestions and make them come true.

Then voila you have a client that will please everybody. But this is nothing new. The d kite model is a drop/inventory model, the wearing model hasn’t been made yet. Also, the plate, nothing special. Its merely combining a platebody model with a d chain. The sleeves through the plate sucks. Maybe combine a d chain and some muscular sleeves like I did, change the color of the sleeves. Makes it look sick. Anyways, good effort. 8/10 for effort.

Read full topic

item.title: My final preview of my client
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“pk3r kyle, post:6, topic:201316”][quote author=mr dharok link=topic=265983.msg2198560#msg2198560 date=1208624922]
kyle, im guessin kite and plate include me right?
[/quote]

For one, there is no kite. Wow, you can add “wield” as what to do, but i bet that you don’t have a model for the wielding… because there isn’t one, thats why you didn’t add a picture of it.
You used my colour dump or post for the summoning i see lol.

if you mean am i releasing them with client, then yes[/quote]

Read full topic

well, ive been working on a client, and here is what ive got:

  • Added metal Dragons upto rune
  • Added all other dragons (black, blue, red, green and kbd)
